meanings.sent1: The ocean near the island is reefier than the open sea.
meanings.sent2: The coral reef looks even reefier under the bright sunlight.
meanings.sent3: I never knew a reef could be reefier than another until I saw them up close.
meanings.sent4: The reefier waters near the shore teem with colorful fish.
meanings.sent5: The reefier terrain made it challenging for the divers to navigate.

meanings.sent1: The reefier rocks provided more hiding spots for the crabs.
meanings.sent2: The reefier section of the beach had more seashells scattered around.
meanings.sent3: The reefier the sand, the more fun it is to build sandcastles!
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a tangled mess, looking even reefier after the windy boat ride.
meanings.sent5: The reefier plants in the garden attracted a variety of butterflies.
